revised_title: Investigating the Role of Dephlogisticated Air in Respiration
tldr: The author conducts experiments to understand the role of dephlogisticated air in respiration. He finds that while some dephlogisticated air enters the blood, most is used to form fixed air during the respiration process. The author also discovers that part of the phlogisticated air enters the blood, suggesting that the dephlogisticated air consumed is not of the purest kind.
